pli-tv-bi-vb-pc6:1.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc6:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena ārohanto nāma mahāmatto bhikkhūsu pabbajito hoti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc6:1.4: Tena kho pana samayena so bhikkhu tassā bhikkhuniyā santike bhattavissaggaṃ karoti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc6:1.5: Atha kho sā bhikkhunī tassa bhikkhuno bhuñjantassa pānīyena ca vidhūpanena ca upatiṭṭhitvā accāvadati.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc6:1.6: Atha kho so bhikkhu taṃ bhikkhuniṃ apasādeti—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc6:1.9: “Pubbe maṃ tvaṃ evañca evañca karosi, idāni ettakaṃ na sahasī”ti—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc6:1.10: pānīyathālakaṃ matthake āsumbhitvā vidhūpanena pahāraṃ adāsi.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc6:1.11: Yā tā bhikkhuniyo appicchā …pe… tā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc6:1.13: “saccaṃ kira, bhikkhave, bhikkhunī bhikkhussa pahāraṃ adāsī”ti?
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc6:1.16: kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, bhikkhunī bhikkhussa pahāraṃ dassati.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc6:1.18: evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddisantu—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc6:1.19: “Yā pana bhikkhunī bhikkhussa bhuñjantassa pānīyena vā vidhūpanena vā upatiṭṭheyya, pācittiyan”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc6:2.2.1: Upasampanne upasampannasaññā pānīyena vā vidhūpanena vā upatiṭṭhati, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc6:2.2.2: Upasampanne vematikā pānīyena vā vidhūpanena vā upatiṭṭhati, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc6:2.2.3: Upasampanne anupasampannasaññā pānīyena vā vidhūpanena vā upatiṭṭhati, āpatti pācittiyassa.
